DOC.brief_summary: A phase II study to evaluate the efficacy and safety profile of the combination of Pemetrexed and Carboplatin in elderly patients with advanced non-small cell lung cancer
DOC.brief_title: Pemetrexed/Carboplatin Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer (NSCLC) Elderly Patients
DOC.criteria: Pathologically confirmed Non Small Cell Lung Cancer Stage IIIb (not amenable to radiotherapy treatment) or Stage IV No previous chemotherapy for lung cancer Men and women > or = 70 years At least one unidimensionally measurable lesion (Response Evaluation Criteria In Solid Tumors [RECIST]criteria) Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group (ECOG) Performance Status 0 to 1 Treatment within the last 30 days with a drug that has not received regulatory approval Serious systemic disorders Inability to discontinue administration of aspirin or antiinflammatory non steroid Concurrent administration of any other antitumor therapy Brain metastasis
